Description.Details: A concentrated Shaped Charge is used to penetrate the Armor on Hard Targets, but it has a reduced blast radius compared to other explosives. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E. Left Click on Ammo count during battle to swap Ammo Type. Ctrl+click on ammunition counter to eject ammo.
Description.Name: Shaped Charge Sniper Ammo
